verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi pasārike niṣedhila
cāṅgaḍā lañā pasāri pasāre vasila

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; pasārike—the shopkeepers; niṣedhila—forbade; cāṅgaḍā lañā—taking the baskets; pasāri—shopkeepers; pasāre vasila—sat down in their shops.
translation: However, Svarūpa Dāmodara stopped them, and the shopkeepers returned to their shops and sat down with their baskets.
